description: Allows to set [input-file] element with file to upload (bypass all native dialogs).
name: UploadFile

properties.onElement: The locator value by which the element will be found.
properties.locator: The locator type by which the element will be found.
properties.argument: The absolute file path to be uploaded using [input-file] controller.

summary: Allows to set [input-file] element with file to upload (bypass all native dialogs).
